messages.content: Dear Voter, I am your UKIP candidate for Bolton North East. I was born in the constituency and have lived all my life in Bolton. I run a small business importing raw materials from China. My job has shown me first-hand the damage the European Union is doing to British people and jobs. UKIP though is not just about Europe. UKIP has a broad range of policies such as controlling immigration, protecting the National Health Service and improving transport in Bolton. Support us on May 7 and get the recovery underway in Bolton.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Addressing the damage the European Union is doing to British people and jobs.

issues.brexitEurope: Addressing the damage the European Union is doing to British people and jobs.
